location.address: Computer Deconstruction Lab, Building 9059, 2201 Marconi Road, Wall Township, N.J. 07719, USA

ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 9pm, then patchy fog and showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Mostly cloudy. Low around 43, with temperatures rising to around 49 overnight. West wind 5 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between 1 and 2 inches possible.

state.message: We are Open and will be here from 7 to 10 PM tonight and Sunday from 12 - 5PM. Come on by for a visit or check us out on Facebook.
